reviews.text:
Stayed for 2 nights, easy check-in , nice staff. The AC in the room stopped cooling at random time, we reset it a few times this it was humid inside as it was hot inside.

The location is close to HBF and few streets around the hotel definitely feels unsafe. There are some highly rated restaurants around too. There are 2 tram stations close by and I used it rather than walk to HBF. I think I will not stay here again for personal reasons.

The rooms are spacious, the bed is really nice.
The area is a bit weird with all the people hanging around, but you definitely feel safe.
If you are disturbed from the noise ask for a room not at the street side.
The prices was excellent.
I would definitely stay there again
Lovely hotel and very friendly staff, although location was awful as in front of the hotel is a gang of drug dealers

I'm in Europe for 2 weeks of work, and chose this hotel in the middle of my trip  because I needed a hotel with laundry service. Their online advertising states they have a laundry service. After checking in today I was notified they actually do not  have a laundry service☹️ Other than that (which is a big one for me) the hotel is a decent value.

Hotel near the train station, with excellent service and comfortable and very nice rooms, we had a problem with the air conditioning, the staff was friendly and very professional, they changed our room and solved the problem,
Although the area is not very nice we had no problems,
